akas: The Voice Kids AU Australia (informal alternative title)
The Voice Kids Australia Australia (alternative title)
akas from release info: The Voice Kids AU Australia (informal alternative title)
The Voice Kids Australia Australia (alternative title)

1.title: The Blind Auditions, Part 1
1.plot: Various Australian children aged between 8 to 14yrs, attempt to impress the judges. Each Coach selects an Artist for their team, with their backs to the stage. Sometimes, the artist will decide which Coach they'd like to work with. Once the teams are set, Coaches dedicate themselves to developing their singers, sharing advice, passing on what they've learned and experienced in their own successful careers.

2.title: The Blind Auditions, Part 2
2.plot: It was the second blind audition of the very first and also only season. The coaches are: Mel B, Joel Madden, Benji Madden and Delta Goodrem. These coaches will turn around in their chair when they hear a performer (between the age of 8 and 14) they want in their team. If there are more coaches who want a performer, he or she gets to choose who they want as their coach.

3.title: The Blind Auditions, Part 3
3.plot: It was the third blind audition of the very first and also only season. The coaches are: Mel B, Joel Madden, Benji Madden and Delta Goodrem. These coaches will turn around in their chair when they hear a performer (between the age of 8 and 14) they want in their team. If there are more coaches who want a performer, he or she gets to choose who they want as their coach.

4.title: The Blind Auditions, Part 4
4.plot: It was the fourth blind audition of the very first and also only season. The coaches are: Mel B, Joel Madden, Benji Madden and Delta Goodrem. These coaches will turn around in their chair when they hear a performer (between the age of 8 and 14) they want in their team. If there are more coaches who want a performer, he or she gets to choose who they want as their coach.

5.title: The Blind Auditions, Part 5
5.plot: It was the fifth and final blind audition of the very first and also only season. The coaches are: Mel B, Joel Madden, Benji Madden and Delta Goodrem. These coaches will turn around in their chair when they hear a performer (between the age of 8 and 14) they want in their team. If there are more coaches who want a performer, he or she gets to choose who they want as their coach.

6.title: The Battles, Part 1
6.plot: The coaches divide their teams into five battle trios each, then the first two trios from each team compete in the battle ring before their coach chooses one artist from each trio to advance to the sing-offs.

7.title: The Battles, Part 2
7.plot: The next two trios from each team compete in the battle ring before their coach chooses one artist from each trio to advance to the sing-offs.

8.title: The Battles, Part 3/The Sing-Offs
8.plot: The final trios from each team compete in the battle ring before their coach chooses one artist to advance to the sing-offs. The fifteen battle winners then reprise the songs that first made the chairs turn before each coach chooses two artists to advance to the grand finale.

9.title: Grand Finale
9.plot: The two remaining artists from each team take to the stage to sing for their place in the competition before each coach chooses one of them to advance to the final. The three artists they choose then sing again before they face the only public vote of the series, after which one of them is crowned as The Voice Kid of Australia.

locations: Fox Studios, Moore Park, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia
imdb.plot outline: An Australian version of the series where children aged from 8 to 14 attempt to impress some superstar coaches, who have to decide if they want the artist on their team based solely on what they hear. Once the teams have been filled, they compete over several rounds from which only one will emerge as The Voice Kid of Australia.
imdb.title: The Voice Kids
plot: The Voice kids is almost exactly like The Voice for adults but it showcases children instead of adults.

An Australian version of the series where children aged from 8 to 14 attempt to impress some superstar coaches, who have to decide if they want the artist on their team based solely on what they hear. Once the teams have been filled, they compete over several rounds from which only one will emerge as The Voice Kid of Australia.::Allister Coots

There are four coaches, who are all famous in the music industry. During the blind auditions these coaches will turn around in their chair when they hear a performer (between the age of 8 and 14) they want in their team. If there are more coaches who want a performer, he or she gets to choose who they want as their coach. During the battles there will be two or three contestants from the same team up against eachother. The coach then has to choose one of them to get through to the live finale.::ImmeVanGorp
